short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See flashcards on each new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Improve your vocabulary with our flashcard extension! Say goodbye to boring new tab pages and hello to new words. 

Our extension replaces the default new tab page with a flashcard deck, allowing you to easily study and learn new words while browsing the web. 

Each time you open a new tab, you'll be presented with a new flashcard, complete with the word, definition. 

It is a must have for language learners.
